findings.title: ST - Stop Transactions
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop transactions for all users excluding the owner.

findings.title: OTUT - Owner Transfer User's Tokens
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to transfer the balance of a userâ€™s address to other addresses.

findings.title: ELFM - Exceed Limit Fees Manipulation
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to increase over the allowed limit of 25%.

findings.title: BC - Blacklisted Contracts
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to massively stop contracts from transactions.

findings.title: Potential for owner abuse of admin functions
findings.description: The owner can manipulate fees, transfer user tokens to other wallets, blacklist addresses, and stop transactions.
findings.location: Various functions in the Auth and DOGEMOON contracts

findings.title: L01 - Public Function could be Declared External
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: Constant state variables should be declared constant to save gas.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Detected missing events for critical arithmetic parameters.

findings.title: L13 - Divide before Multiply Operation
findings.description: Performing divisions before multiplications may cause lose of prediction.

findings.title: L14 - Uninitialized Variables in Local Scope
findings.description: The are variables that are defined in the local scope and are not initialized.

findings.title: Potential honeypot creation
findings.description: The contract can be converted into a honeypot and prevent users from selling if the owner abuses admin functions.
findings.location: various functions in the DOGEMOON contract
